headline: Equinix’s Sovereign AI Node Highlights Growth Potential And Valuation Gap
summary: Equinix is hosting Australia's first sovereign AI infrastructure node at its SY5 data centre in Sydney. The new node enables highly efficient, locally hosted AI inferencing for enterprises and government agencies. The setup is designed to support strict data residency needs and operate without traditional GPU constraints. For investors watching Equinix (NasdaqGS:EQIX), this move places the company at the centre of Australia’s push for sovereign AI capacity. The shares recently closed at...

headline: Equinix (EQIX) Upgraded to Buy: Here's Why
summary: Equinix (EQIX) might move higher on growing optimism about its earnings prospects, which is reflected by its upgrade to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy).
